valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 1 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 2 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Norwegian Sea 988 expected southern Sweden 973 by 1800 new year's day. New low expected just west of FitzRoy 990 by same time

Wind
Northwest 5 to 7, increasing gale 8 to storm 10, then veering north 6 to gale 8 later.

Rough or very rough becoming high.
Weather
Squally wintry showers.
Visibility
Good becoming moderate, occasionally poor.
